Class NodeImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jackrabbit.core.ItemImpl
      org.apache.jackrabbit.core.NodeImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.jcr.Item, ItemStateListener, javax.jcr.Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
FrozenNode, VersionHistoryImpl
public class NodeImpl
extends ItemImpl
implements javax.jcr.Node

NodeImpl implements the Node interface.

internalSetProperty

public javax.jcr.Property internalSetProperty(QName name,
                                              InternalValue value)
                                       throws javax.jcr.ValueFormatException,
                                              javax.jcr.RepositoryException
Sets the internal value of a property without checking any constraints.

Note that no type conversion is being performed, i.e. it's the caller's responsibility to make sure that the type of the given value is compatible with the specified property's definition.

Parameters:
name -
value -
Returns:
Throws:
javax.jcr.ValueFormatException
javax.jcr.RepositoryException
